text: to (ai rasool) jin logon ke dilon mein (nefaaq kee) beemaaree hai tum unhen dekhoge ki unamen daud daud ke mile jaate hain aur tumase usakee vajah yah bayaan karate hain ki ham to isase darate hain ki kaheen aisa na ho unake na (milane se) zamaane kee gardish mein na mubtila ho jaen to anaqareeb hee khuda (musalamaanon kee) fateh ya koee aur baat apanee taraf se zaahir kar dega tab yah log is badagumaanee par jo apane jee mein chhipaate the sharmaenge
